recipe.title: Slow Cooker Root Beer Chicken Wings Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Season chicken wings with salt and pepper.
Spray your slow cooker pot with cooking spray, add chicken wings, bbq sauce and root beer. Cover, cook on low for 4 hours.
Remove wings from slow cooker, place on parchment lined tray. Brush more bbq sauce onto wings, sprinkle on some brown sugar. Place under broiler for 8 -10 minutes.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Season chicken wings with salt and pepper.
Spray your slow cooker pot with cooking spray, add chicken wings, bbq sauce and root beer.
Cover, cook on low for 4 hours.
Remove wings from slow cooker, place on parchment lined tray.
Brush more bbq sauce onto wings, sprinkle on some brown sugar.
